title: (x) Geometric sans "Different Strokes" logo - Digital Sans {Dav}
content:
Can anyone ID the font used on “Different Strokes” at this website…

[www.dsgolfcenters.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052119/http:/www.dsgolfcenters.com/)

Thank you
author: evan

comments.content:
Evan,

I’m pretty sure it’s something by [ShyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052119/http:/moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/shyfonts/shy01.htm). _Intellivised_ is pretty close. Too bad you can’t see previews of the different fonts on that page.

Also, you might want to browse through the sci-fi section at [DaFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052119/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=303&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=DIFFERENT+STROKES&nb_ppp=10&classt=alpha) for similar techno-ish fonts.

Not with the intent to undercut Fontshop or E&F, but both of their websites credit Brendel Typestudio with the design of this typeface. I thought I’d mention, then, that it can be had from the current Web face of Brendel Informatik, [The Quick Brown Fox](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052119/http:/www.qbf.de/tceng.htm), for nearly $10 less. It goes by the name there of, simply, Digital. No promise of equal quality, though.
